desc: Your one stop shop to find all the new and recent book releases from Black Authors! Whether you are looking for diverse reads, banned books, or critical race theory, you will find something here. Promoting the works of Black Authors everyday! Home of the Black Author Book Deals, The Book Blogger’s Planner, and The Blac

layout.text: An online community dedicated to uplifting the diverse works of Black authors to a variety of readers.
